resources.string: You got %1$.1f out of 5! Play again tomorrow!
Music is Trivia is a daily game for music lovers. You are prompted with an artist and a list of their most played songs on Spotify. Your goal is to choose the 5 most played songs in the correct order
Tap songs in the order of most played to least played (1 to 5). If you make a mistake, tap Clear Selections and start over. Submit once you have chosen 5 songs.
You get half a point for each chosen song that is in the artist\'s top 5 played songs o Spotify. You get an additional half point if the song is in the correct order.
